channel.title: Tim Morrill on The Huddle
channel.description: Recent content in Tim Morrill on The Huddle

item.title: The New School Warm-up
item.description: A quality warm up should simply prepare the body for the work to follow. What is to follow? A match of our beautiful, dynamic sport that involves sprinting, jumping, throwing, marking and changing direction… Ok, so how do we prepare for all that? The New School Warm Up: Pros: The most effective way to prepare the body to work out Cons: Takes a relatively long time, requires tools, is not flashy
